name: An expensive dagger forged from gold (1h)
data: It has mediocre weapon class for its type (little in general).
This item loses its magical powers very fast.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'triple backstab'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'sneak'.
It increases the users physical resistance a bit.
It gives tiny penalty to the skill 'double backstab'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'attack'.
It gives tiny penalty to the skill 'disguise'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'backstab'.
It is forged by the Scourge.
It seeks critical veins of its target.
